content: this pattern has been designed for the september/october 2012 knitalong of the hazel knits group named after the wild fireweed flowers growing all over northern ontario socks in the top photo were made using hazel knits artisan in the colorways queen of the night and hydrangea april club colors 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/hazel-knits-artisans/2260602/1-25
